label: Which platform drives the most watch hours?
sql:
SELECT p.name AS platform, ROUND(SUM(watch_hours), 1) AS total_watch_hours
FROM fact_engagements f
JOIN dim_platform p ON f.platform_id = p.platform_id
GROUP BY p.name
ORDER BY total_watch_hours DESC;

label: How engaged are audiences by content type?
sql:
SELECT c.label AS content_type, ROUND(SUM(engaged_users) * 1.0 / SUM(impressions), 3) AS engagement_rate
FROM fact_engagements f
JOIN dim_content_type c ON f.content_type_id = c.content_type_id
GROUP BY c.label
ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;

label: EU vs. non-EU coverage (placeholder)
sql:
SELECT p.region, COUNT(*) AS row_count, ROUND(SUM(impressions) / 1000.0, 1) AS impressions_k
FROM fact_engagements f
JOIN dim_platform p ON f.platform_id = p.platform_id
GROUP BY p.region;
